name: Crumble (gaet)
description:
This is a game for the BlendingGameJam #2019 on the theme "End of the world".

You play as Maggot, a weird little guy trying to repair his flat world being destroyed by meteorites and more. 

Maggot is not the smartest one, though and sometimes, he breaks things instead of fixing them.

Moreover, you would think Maggot would be a friendly chap, considering his world is ending and all but no : he fights with Charra if she dares join him on his apocalypse journey...

What an ass...

Note that Crumble is meant to be played in a browser. It has been developed on firefox and has not been tested anywhere so do not be suprised if it breaks on other browsers (particularly chrome as it is more touchy for file requests on localhost)...
